hero.title: Foundation for Equal Employment and Social Services
hero.subtitle: Empowering communities across Africa through sustainable development, education, and social services.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text: FEESOS is a nonprofit organization based in the United States, dedicated to raising awareness and funds for organizations and individuals in Africa. We believe in creating lasting change through collaborative efforts and sustainable development initiatives.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.text: A world where every individual in Africa has equal access to employment opportunities, education, and essential social services, enabling them to thrive and contribute to their communities.

items.title: Integrity
items.description: We operate with complete transparency and accountability in all our endeavors.

items.title: Empowerment
items.description: We believe in equipping individuals with the tools and resources they need to succeed.

items.title: Collaboration
items.description: We work alongside local communities and organizations to create sustainable solutions.

items.title: Equality
items.description: We are committed to ensuring fair access to opportunities for all individuals.

whatWeDo.title: What We Do
whatWeDo.subtitle: Our programs focus on creating sustainable impact across Africa through education, employment, and social services.

programs.title: Education Initiatives
programs.description: Supporting schools, providing scholarships, and developing educational resources to empower the next generation.

programs.title: Employment Programs
programs.description: Creating job opportunities, vocational training, and entrepreneurship support to foster economic independence.

programs.title: Healthcare Access
programs.description: Partnering with local clinics and organizations to improve healthcare accessibility in underserved communities.

programs.title: Community Development
programs.description: Building infrastructure, providing clean water access, and supporting local initiatives for sustainable growth.

ourTeam.title: Our Team
ourTeam.subtitle: Meet the dedicated individuals working to make a difference.

news.subtitle: Stay updated with our recent activities and announcements.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.gdprText: We are committed to protecting your privacy and complying with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and the California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA). You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal data at any time.
privacy.dataCollectionText: We collect only the information necessary to process donations and communicate with supporters. This may include your name, email address, and payment information.
privacy.dataUseText: Your data is used solely for processing donations, sending receipts, and keeping you informed about our work (with your consent).
privacy.contact: For data requests, please contact us at privacy@feesos.org
